vault_identity_group.description: Creates an Identity Group for Vault.

name.description: Name of the identity group to create.

type.description: Type of the group, internal or external. Defaults to `internal`.

policies.description: A list of policies to apply to the group.

metadata.description: A Map of additional metadata to associate with the group.

member_group_ids.description: A list of Group IDs to be assigned as group members.

member_entity_ids.description: A list of Entity IDs to be assigned as group members. Not allowed on `external` groups.

external_policies.description: `false` by default. If set to `true`, this resource will ignore any policies return from Vault or specified in the resource. You can use [`vault_identity_group_policies`](identity_group_policies.html
